snippet.title: Zoeti | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1434540/Zoeti/ 

Zoeti is out now!

A once peaceful land, now overrun by monsters. You, a Star-Soul hero, are among a select few blessed to raze the land of evil.

In Zoeti, you are equipped with a deck of playing cards, with which you play card combinations (pair, full house, royal flush, etc.) to activate skills that will attack or defend against enemies. Further bolster your arsenal of skills and upgrades through battles and discovery. The blood of a dead god congeals into monsters roaming the countryside, threatening devout townsfolk and the simple lives they lead. Will you, a Star-Soul hero, protect them from the ravages of evil?

To learn more about Zoeti, Akupara Games, and Dusklight Games visit:
►Dusklight Games: https://en.dusklightgames.com/ 
►Akupara Games: https://linktr.ee/akuparagames 
►Zoeti: https://linktr.ee/zoeti
